column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We started with the bacon wrapped dates--delicious melt in your mouth salty sweet perfection! We also got the spicy potato wedges. Very good--loved the creamy sauce that accompanied them. We followed that up with the scallops
column2: which our server said was one of his favorites. They were excellent. And finally we got the Brussels sprouts
column3: which was basically a salad. Also good!
